title: Dealing With Unexpected Difficulties | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Dealing With Unexpected Difficulties | Joel Osteen
description:
When you find yourself in a difficult season, you have to remember that difficulty is not a surprise to God. It may feel unexpected, but if God allowed it, He has a way to use it for your advantage. 


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
